indexes.name: ca_articulo_trazas_articulos
indexes.constraint: FOREIGN KEY (referencia) REFERENCES articulos (referencia) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE

indexes.name: ca_articulo_trazas_linalbcli
indexes.constraint: FOREIGN KEY (idlalbventa) REFERENCES lineasalbaranescli (idlinea) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE

indexes.name: ca_articulo_trazas_linfaccli
indexes.constraint: FOREIGN KEY (idlfacventa) REFERENCES lineasfacturascli (idlinea) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE

indexes.name: ca_articulo_trazas_linalbprov
indexes.constraint: FOREIGN KEY (idlalbcompra) REFERENCES lineasalbaranesprov (idlinea) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE

indexes.name: ca_articulo_trazas_linfacprov
indexes.constraint: FOREIGN KEY (idlfaccompra) REFERENCES lineasfacturasprov (idlinea) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE
